title: i have problem how to fix this
body:
my id lagging so hard but my ping still 260 , i try create new id no problem but i need my old id , please help 

thnks

replies.body: Lag or ping problems are usually caused by a poor connection problem, and has nothing to do with the account you're logged onto.  Run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) to find out what's going on with your connection, along with some resolution steps specific to your issue.  Hope that helps!
